use_dynamic_pricing.label: Use dynamic pricing
use_dynamic_pricing.comment: To use Sheepla dynamic pricing, please activate this mode in Sheepla platform and create basic pricing rules at the current source.

status_after_sync.comment: Change order status after Sheepla synchronization to current selected value.
